name: Gothic Tattoo Artist
description:
The fashion studio is open for business for gothic dress up and drawing artist tattoos. A punk princess requires a top tattoo design studio for her goth fashion needs. She’s a goth girl and like any other tattoo girls she likes to dress up as goth princess in her princess studio.

OXO Games Studio brings another best tattoo game for girls making another addition in fashion games, girls games, artist games and dress up games. Use virtual tattoo machine to draw tattoos as on the punk princess because she loves fashion tattoo design studio.

FEATURES :
- A punk and goth fashion themed environment
- An original and unique goth girl design
- Multiple beautiful goth tattoos to choose
- A great girls dress up & tattoo fashion game
- Wide variety of artist tattoos
- Beautiful HD Graphics
- Easy to play
- Free to play forever
- No In-App Purchases
- No Wi-Fi required
and much more…
